# Persona Template

Use this template to add or update personas/roles.

## Name
- Title: [e.g., Quality Assurance Lead]

## Purpose / Summary
- One-sentence summary of role purpose.

## Responsibilities
- Bullet list of primary responsibilities.

## Typical activities
- Bullet list of recurring tasks the role performs.

## Primary contacts
- List roles or team contacts this persona coordinates with (e.g., Project Manager, Dev Lead).

## Interactions
- Short bullets describing how this role hands off to or collaborates with other roles.

## RACI assignments
- Example: Planning: A=Project Manager, R=Product Owner, C=Dev Lead, I=Stakeholder Liaison
- TODO: Fill specific R/A/C/I for common activities relevant to this persona.
